Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.utils.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
Dedicated class for data manipulation Using singleton pattern

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static DatabaseManager getInstance()
      Get the instance of database manager, following singleton pattern
      Returns:
      the instance of database manager

    • getDAOProvider

      public static DAOProvider getDAOProvider()

    • setTestConnection

      public static void setTestConnection(Connection testConnection)
      Sets a test database connection for the singleton instance. If the singleton instance does not exist yet, it will be created. This method is synchronized to be thread-safe.
      Parameters:
      testConnection - the test Connection to be used by DatabaseManager

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Check if the database is connected
      Returns:
      true if it's connected, false otherwise

    • executeUpdate

      public boolean executeUpdate(String sql, Object... params)
      Method to execute a statement that updates or create tables
      Parameters:
      sql - statement converted in string
      params - statement parameters
      Returns:
      true if the statement ran without problems, false otherwise

    • executeQuery

      public <T> T executeQuery(String sql, DatabaseManager.ResultSetProcessor<T> processor, Object... params)
      Method to execute a query that returns a result set
      Parameters:
      sql - sql statement converted in string
      processor - lambda expression (processor type) that contains the result set management
      params - statement parameters
      Returns:
      type of the object returned from the processor

    • getLastInsertId

      public Integer getLastInsertId()
      Retrieves the last inserted row ID from the current database connection. Works with SQLite's last_insert_rowid() function.
      Returns:
      the last inserted ID as Integer, or null if an error occurs
